title: Channel a Physician
description: A Physician is a Medical Practitioner who specializes in general or internal medicine (diagnosing & treatment) other than surgical means.

title: Channel a Cardiologist
description: A Cardiologist specializes in the structure, functions, and diseases of the heart and blood vessels.

title: Channel a Gynecologist
description: A Gynecologist is a medical specialist who has specialized in the diseases of women & girls, particularly of their female reproductive system.

title: Channel a Pediatrician
description: A Pediatrician is a medical practitioner specializing in children and their diseases.

title: Channel a Neurologist
description: A Neurologist is a medical doctor who specializes on diseases of the nervous system including the brain and spinal cord.

title: Channel an Endocrinologist and Diabetologist
description: A Physician specializing on the structures and functions of the endocrine glands and the substances they secrete.

title: Channel an Eye Surgeon
description: An Eye Surgeon is a medical professional who specializes on the surgical intervention & other remedies for the diseases/disorders of the Eye.
